SwitchPreference.android:summary: Disable # (pound/hash) indicator in status bar. For CM12/CM12.1/CM13

SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allows to have both software menu button and menu mapped to key on CM. For CM12/CM12.1/CM13

SwitchPreference.android:title: One Way Brightness
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Make auto brightness go only up. For CM12.1/CM13

SwitchPreference.android:title: Battery Light Disabler
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Battery light will not shine when in downtime (Interruptions) or when the screen is on. For CM12.1/CM13

SwitchPreference.android:title: Remap PREV button to PLAY/PAUSE
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow use volume keys to change volume, advance to next song and play/pause. For CM12.1/CM13

SwitchPreference.android:title: Remap NEXT button to Torch (when not playing)
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Allow use volume up key (long press) to start flashlight (when music is off). For CM12.1/CM13
